serviceList.name: Face

serviceItemList.name: Fruit Facial
serviceItemList.information: Unclogs Pores and Fades Scar - This unique VLCC Fruit Facial lightens your blemishes, minimizes enlarged pores and fades superficial pigmentation. It also provides even skin tone and fairer complexion.
serviceItemList.benefits: Reduces enlarged pores, Fades superficial pigmentation, Lightens blemishes
serviceItemList.ingredients: Aloevera, Vitamin E, Olive Oil, Papaya Seed, Cucumber, Peach, Orange, Green Apple and Walnut

serviceItemList.name: Anti-Tan Facial
serviceItemList.information: Fades Tan - VLCC Anti-Tan Facial helps fading the sun tan and leaves skin softer, fairer, radiant and moisturised.
serviceItemList.benefits: Reduces effect of UV rays on your skin, Evens out dull, patchy and damaged skin, Controls excessive secretion of oil from skin
serviceItemList.ingredients: Oatmeal, Rice Flour, Aloevera, Cucumber, Pomegranate and Quince Seed

serviceItemList.name: Skin Tightening Facial
serviceItemList.information: Firms up Skin and Refines Pores - VLCC Skin Tightening Facial helps in reducing fine lines and wrinkles while delivering a firming effect. It naturally heals the skin, tightens the pores and provides a smooth and supple effect to the skin
serviceItemList.benefits: Firms up skin, Refines pores, Makes lesser fine lines and wrinkles
serviceItemList.ingredients: Indian Berberry, Wheat, Lime, Geranium, Almond, Vitamin E, Lavender and Palmarosa

serviceItemList.name: Instaglow Facial
serviceItemList.information: Makes Skin Soft and Glowing - VLCC Instaglow facial provides instant glow to your skin leaving it fairer, radiant and nourished.
serviceItemList.benefits: Makes skin soft and glowing, Makes skin hydrated and toned
serviceItemList.ingredients: Indian Berberry, Papaya seed, Mulberry, Saffron and Mango seed powder

serviceItemList.name: Radiant Pearl Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Radiant Pearl Facial controls melanin production and gradually makes the skin look whiter and brighter.
serviceItemList.benefits: Removes dead and damaged skin, Removes dark spots, Hydrates dull skin
serviceItemList.ingredients: Licorice Extract, Green Tea Extract and Pearl Dust

serviceItemList.name: Lotus Whiteglow Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Whiteglow Facial lightens skin tone by treating pigmentation at the root. It reduces uneven pigmentation and whitens skin naturally by diminishing dark spots.
serviceItemList.benefits: Lightens skin tone, Whitens skin naturally, Diminishes uneven pigmentation
serviceItemList.ingredients: Oatmeal, Yoghurt and Bearberry Extracts

serviceItemList.name: Radiant Gold Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Radiant Gold Facial contains radiant gold exfoliating cleanser. It boosts radiance and brightens the skin through deep cleansing. It is filled with papaya and horse chestnut extracts which helps in removing rashes and irritation  providing flawless, smooth and clear skin.
serviceItemList.benefits: Helps to get glowing and toned skin, Maintains skin elasticity, Nourishes skin for young look
serviceItemList.ingredients: 24K Gold Leaves, Papaya and Horse Chestnut extracts

serviceItemList.name: Radiant Diamond Facial
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Radiant Diamond Facial contains exfoliating cleanser that penetrate deep into the fine layers of skin making it soft and rejuvenated. It consists of a brilliant peeling extract which tenderly uproots cosmetics and pollution, leaving skin hydrated and young.
serviceItemList.benefits: Prevents the early signs of ageing, Preserves skin elasticity, Helps in shedding the skin
serviceItemList.ingredients: Amber Extract, Cinnamon Exract and Diamond Dust

serviceItemList.name: O3+ Whitening Facial
serviceItemList.information: O3+ Whitening Facial is best for skin whitening and pigmentation control. It comprises Of Whitening Cleansing Foam, Whitening Tonic, Whitening Serum, Whitening Cream and Whitening Mask and is suitable for all skin types.
serviceItemList.benefits: Increases Fairness, Controls Pigmentation
serviceItemList.recommended: Normal to dry skin, All skin types
serviceItemList.ingredients: Aqua, Aloevera Extract, Fruit Extract, Wheat Germ Oil, Almond, Shea Butter and Mushroom Extract

serviceItemList.name: O3+ Seaweed Facial
serviceItemList.information: O3+ Seaweed Facial is suitable for normal to oily skin and is recommended for acne prone skin. O3+ Seaweed Facial comprises of Seaweed Cleansing Gel, Seaweed Tonic, Seaweed Serum, Seaweed Cream and Seaweed Mask. It brightens your skin and fades marks.
serviceItemList.benefits: Brightens skin, Fades marks and blemishes, Oil control and brightening
serviceItemList.recommended: Normal to oily skin, Acne prone skin
serviceItemList.ingredients: Aqua, Citric Extract, Green Tea Extract, Seaweed Extract, Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter and Mineral Oil

serviceItemList.name: Hydravitals Cleanup
serviceItemList.information: Lotus Hydravitals Cleanup imparts a healthy glow to your face. It is very good to keep blemishes, blackheads and minor imperfections of your skin away.
serviceItemList.benefits: Reduces Dryness from skin, Deep cleanses the skin, Unclogs pores
serviceItemList.ingredients: Oatmeal, Jojoba, Green Extracts and Chamomile

serviceList.metaDescription: Premium facial,threading and bleach service right at your doorstep
serviceList.metaKeyword: salon at home, facial,waxing at home
serviceList.captionHeading: For best impression at first sight
serviceList.caption: Glam your face with skilled threading, facial, bleach
serviceList.serviceDescription:
Its true that facial skin is different from other body skin and requires utter care. you should employ facial and bleach under expert care to keep it young and scintillating, facial not only cleans, exfoliates and nourishes the skin, but also makes the complexion well-hydrated to make the skin look younger. while bleach can lighten up their skin that have been affected by discolouration and pigmentation issues.

Lookplex professionals understand the quirks of all sort of your skin and take extra care in handling the same. With a Lookplex professional, a facial beauty begins with a consultation like asking questions about your skin concerns, diet, your water intake etc. These can affect your skin and what kind of treatments she recommends.

After wrapping your hair with a towel or headband, the professional begins the facial with a thorough cleansing, using cotton pads. Unlike others, we relax your face to soften up any blackheads and whiteheads to be extracted. This is followed by a facial mask and then advice on home skin care.

Although it varies from person to person, one should get a facial done once a month. Moreover, whenever there is a season change, it is recommended that you go for a facial.

serviceList.name: Bridal
serviceList.metaTitle: Renowned name in salon at home services
serviceList.metaDescription: Provide premium bridal service at comfort of home. Happily served more than 1500+ bridal makeup queries in 2015-16
serviceList.metaKeyword: bridal makeup delhi,premium bridal makeup,bridal package,bridal at home
serviceList.captionHeading: Because you deserve the best on your wedding day
serviceList.caption: Premium Bridal service at your doorstep
serviceList.serviceDescription:
We believe that your wedding day isn't the time to experiment with smoky eyes or a dark lipstick or some funky hairstyle for the first time. You would like to choose tones and hairdo , that make you feel comfortable and confident.

With our experienced makeup artists at the helm of affairs, your makeup is bound to look exotic. Our expertise in all aspects of makeup will definitely make your big day more glamorous.

Our vision is to make your wedding experience delightful and hassle-free in every possible way. So, on that busy day of your wedding, stay at your home and our makeup artists will reach you to make you the dream bride. Get ready for you big day with all comforts at your home.

To match the makeup, we also have a team of creative hairstylists and bridal makeup artist. To finally complete the look we help you drape your saree/lehenga in the trendiest and upcoming ways, which will help you be comfortable on your big day.
